title: उद्योगों में फर्स्ट एड, कृत्रिम श्वसन और सीपीआर
content: उद्योगों में फर्स्ट एड, कृत्रिम श्वसन और सीपीआर
image_desc: A close-up shot of a honeycomb dripping with golden honey, with bees buzzing around it.
narration: Honey, a sweet treat enjoyed for centuries, is more than just a delicious topping.  It's a natural remedy with antibacterial properties, often used for soothing sore throats.  And of course, it's a fascinating product of the honeybee's hard work!
